original: 馮翊萬年人。頗有曹操昔年任洛陽北部尉時的風範，不畏權貴，誅殺違法的曹洪門客，因而得到曹操賞識，命他為鄴縣縣令，後又升任京兆尹。
text: Feng Yi Wannian. Cao Cao had the same demeanor as when he was a lieutenant in northern Luoyang. He was not afraid of the powerful and killed the illegal Cao Hongmen, so he was appreciated by Cao Cao, ordered him to be the county magistrate of Yexian, and later promoted to Jing Zhaoyin.
